room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: My girlfriend and I booked the "Dying Love" room and it was awesome! The experience is really cool and the staff was outstanding! We have never had anything like this in our town before so I was pretty excited when I found out it was opening! There were four other people in the room with us that we had never met before but it was a great experience and they were super cool! We will definitely be going back!

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We went with a group of friends to celebrate our birthdays. None of us had ever been to an escape room. We tried the Dying Love room and it didn't disappoint! We will definitely go back for another try since we are "still trapped." We loved all the surprises, puzzles, and distractions. The owners were so friendly.

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We had an awesome time! Dying love was very challenging, but we escaped. Definitely recommend Epic Escape Rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: We went to Epic Escape room as part of a bachelorette night for my sister. We booked the Dying Love room. It was so much fun! We had a blast! The staff was so nice. Will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Dying Love" by Epic Escape Rooms in Valdosta
review: So fun! Just finished the “Dying Love” room with my family. The storyline was interesting, the puzzles and clues were just hard enough to challenge you and keep you thinking without being impossible. Such nice staff, very warm and wonderful people working the rooms. Definitely want to come back and try all the other rooms soon!
